mapper.select: SELECT id, evaluator_id, name, dish_id, time, timestamp, comment, evaluation_score, weight FROM dish_review
SELECT id, evaluator_id, name, dish_id, time, timestamp, comment, evaluation_score, weight FROM dish_review WHERE dish_id = #{DishId} ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, evaluator_id, name, dish_id, time, timestamp, comment, evaluation_score, weight FROM dish_review WHERE evaluator_id = #{evaluatorId} AND dish_id = #{dishId} ORDER BY timestamp DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dish_review (evaluator_id, name, dish_id, time, timestamp, comment, evaluation_score, weight) VALUES (#{evaluatorId}, #{name}, #{dishId}, #{time}, #{timestamp}, #{comment}, #{evaluationScore}, #{weight})
